name.description: The bundle's name, will be used for directory names (should therefor not contain / or \)

sty.description: Names of LaTeX packages included in the bundle (.sty files)

sty-dir.description: Where .sty files are located, relative to the config file

cls.description: Names of LaTeX classes included in the bundle (.cls files)

cls-dir.description: Where .cls files are located, relative to the config file

res.description: Additional files used by files of the bundle, e.g. pictures

res-dir.description: Where resource files are located, relative to the config file

cwl-dir.description: Location of .cwl files (TeXStudio autocompletion files), relative to the config file
